text: In this week's curated career highlight from Archinect Jobs, we are featuring 20 Project Manager and Project Architect roles currently available in New York City. To explore specific job titles from the architectural profession, consult Archinect's Guide to Job Titles series. Also, follow our Archinect Tips series to improve your portfolio, resume, and interviewing skills, to increase your overall chances of getting that next job. Skidmore, Owings & Merrill (SOM) seeks a Project Manager, Higher Education Practice Lead and a Project Manager - Transportation Project Manager, Higher Education Practice Lead details: "This role requires understanding of the higher education market, development of relevant data, tools, and models to serve these clients, and contributes to design innovation to advance SOM’s reputation of design excellence in this practice area. Signiﬁcant knowledge and expertise in campus master planning, space programming, stakeholder engagement, and community outreach for Higher Education institutions is required." Project Manager - Transportation details: "This role will focus on aviation projects including all aspects of terminal building planning and design including airside, landside and the various specialties such as baggage handling and airport systems, needed to deliver terminal development programs. The role may also include other transportation programs ranging from transportation master planning and TOD projects to heavy rail, light rail, bus, ports and other related and ancillary facilities." The firm is also hiring a Project Manager in Chicago. Billie Jean King Main Library by Skidmore, Owings and Merrill (SOM).Steinberg Hart seeks a Project Architect"Steinberg Hart is seeking a licensed Architect, who will be responsible for guiding design teams through the design and technical development and refinement of projects and managing all technical documentation through each phase of construction." Qualifications include proficiency with Revit, AutoCAD, SketchUp or Rhino, 3D Studio Max, Maxwell Render, Twinmotion, or Enscape, and Microsoft Office. The firm is also hiring for a number of other roles. Montalba Architects seeks a Project Manager"We are currently seeking an individual with 8+ years of full-time experience working in an architectural office to join our team in Los Angeles or New York as an Architect II / Project Manager." Qualifications include strong skills in AutoCAD (and/or Revit) and Adobe Creative Suite." LR2 Residence by Montalba Architects. Photo: Kevin ScottIMC Architecture seeks a Project Architect/Interior Designer and a Senior Project Architect Project Architect/Interior Designer details: "IMC is seeking a candidate for Project Architect/Interior Designer with a strong design sense and a minimum of 5-8 years of experience with expertise in Interior Architecture, Preparation of Construction Documents, and Building Information Modeling. Candidates must be self-motivated, reliable, and able to manage all aspects of a project." Senior Project Architect details: "Responsibilities will include site surveying, planning, production of design development and construction documents, construction administration, site meetings, and direct client interaction. Candidates must be self-motivated, reliable, and able to manage all aspects of a project." The firm is also hiring for a number of other roles. Mapos Architects seeks a Senior Architect Project Manager"Mapos Architects, DPC is seeking an experienced Senior Project Manager Architect for full-time employment. Our current and potential projects include private residential, medium-scale developments, retail, hotel, wellness, master planning, and almost everything in between." Qualifications include eight-plus years of experience and proficiency with hand-sketching, Revit, SketchUp, Enscape, Adobe Creative Suite, and Microsoft Office. Peconic Bay House by Mapos Architects. Photo: Michael MoranRKTB Architects seeks a Senior Architect/Project Manager"Positions will involve design and technical aspects of projects of varying sizes and complexity, with a focus on the rehabilitation of public housing." Qualifications include a minimum of ten years of experience, strong AutoCAD skills, experience with Construction Administration, Construction Document experience, and strong technical knowledge of existing building renovation and new construction. 433 Broadway by RKTB Architects. Photo: Albert Vecerka/EstoDattner Architects seeks a Project Architect - Education, a Project Architect - Interiors, a Project Architect - Sustainability, and a Project Architect - Healthcare Project Architect - Education details: "We are seeking a highly motivated and design-oriented Project Architect to join our cultural and institutional studio to work on education projects. The ideal candidate will have experience in all phases of new building design from SD through CA in a leadership role within a collaborative team." Project Architect - Interiors details: "They will develop design concepts, material palettes, FF+E packages, and technical drawings including interior detailing and associated schedules. This candidate will also work closely with project design teams on all phases of project development (from planning and concept through design, FF+E selection, and construction documents) for high-profile public and private sector clients." Project Architect - Sustainability details: "Working closely with our Director of Sustainability and individual project teams, the Sustainability Project Architect will lead the integration of sustainable principles into our work, with an emphasis not only innovative ideas, but also implementation and impact through benchmarking and iterative modeling of sustainable strategies." Project Architect - Healthcare details: "We are seeking a talented, experienced, and highly motivated Project Architect to join our cultural and institutional studio to work on healthcare, education, and commercial projects. selected candidate will work as a key part of the project team on the programming, planning, and design of ambulatory care spaces, commercial interiors, and schools in the New York area. This hands-on role will include client engagement and management of junior staff." The firm is also hiring an Architect/Designer - Education. Brooklyn College School of Cinema by Dattner Architects.Curtis + Ginsberg Architects seeks an Architect / Project Manager"With projects valued at over $250 million in construction, C+GA is currently seeking an Architect / Project Manager with a minimum of 10+ years of experience with experience working on existing buildings, to work on exciting projects from conception through construction." SARAH JEFFERYS DESIGN Architecture and Interiors seeks a Residential Architect/ Project ManagerQualifications include three to five years of related experience, proficiency with AutoCAD, SketchUp, 3D modeling, Adobe Creative Suite, and Microsoft Office, on-site Construction Administration experience, and strong organizational and communication skills. Samuel Anderson Architects seeks a Project Architect"Samuel Anderson Architects seeks a talented, resourceful and motivated individual to work on our interesting new museum & library projects & studies. Minimum of 5 years experience. AutoCAD and Revit proficiency please." Studio SFW seeks a Project Manager"Candidates should have 6+ years experience in project management, exhibit strong design and organizational skills, and be able to contribute to a fast-paced, creative office. Candidates must demonstrate excellent communication, interpersonal and leadership skills and commit to establishing a positive and effective working relationship with all members of the project team, both internal and external." Brooklyn Heights Carriage House by Studio SFW. Photo: Tim LenzFROM Architecture seeks a Project Architect"The candidate needs to have working experience in high-end residential and retail projects. It's preferred a diversified experience that includes design skills and technical knowledge. Great communication and proactive and positive attitude are a must. Proficiency in Autocad, Adobe Suite (Photoshop, In-Design, Illustrator), and Rhino is required." Verona Carpenter Architects seeks a Project ArchitectQualifications include twelve to fifteen years of experience, proficiency with Revit, strong design and technical skills; able to independently produce construction documents and details, strong organizational and management skills, and strong verbal and written communication skills. The firm is also hiring a Junior Designer. Montauk House by Verona Carpenter Architects. Photo: Barkow PhotoMammoth seeks a Project Designer/Project Architect"The ideal candidate is a self-motivated, detail-oriented, and a creative individual who values clear and open communication. Please be highly proficient in some combination of AutoCAD, Revit, Photoshop, Illustrator (and related). Please let us know which you excel in, in your application. Minimum of 2 years of professional experience is required. NYC experience is preferred." Baird Architects seeks a Senior Project Architect"We are looking to hire a highly motivated and organized senior project architect with a minimum of seven years of experience. Our firm's work ranges from high-end residential to commercial and cultural at varying scales. Our investigations into the unique material language of each project are tempered by a sensitivity to economic and environmental concerns, and we exploit these constraints to generate novel building forms."
